Trigger The target of your @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.actions.Item.Get 'Em!] is reduced to 0 Hit Points.

Requirements You used Get 'Em! against a creature on your last turn.

When the target you directed your allies to take down falls @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.conditions.Item.Unconscious] or is destroyed, you quickly direct them at another target. You use Get 'Em! against a new target following all the normal targeting restrictions for Get 'Em! You don't count as leading by example against this new target.
